author: Dale DeGroff
description: A hint of blueberry fruit with oolong tea, elderflower, sage and lemon.
name: Blue Moon Cocktail (Dale DeGroff's recipe)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker (just to break skin)
ADD vodka and one heaped spoon of oolong tea and stir in base of shaker for 60 seconds (or better still, leave to steep for ten minutes)
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
